text:
Hello Guys,

i don’t know why javascript is not working in module.html (HTML + HubL)
(it works in main.js)
I’ve attached a screenshot in this message, and can you kindly let me know how to solve this ?
Hey Yuya, have you confirmed that jQuery is enabled on your site and have you checked the console for errors?

<@UGY6JNTB4>
Thank you for your reply.
Yes. jQuery is enabled, but it seems that the console tells some error
” Uncaught ReferenceError: $ is not defined”,

 so can you kindly let me know how to read jQuery in module.html ?

or i need to write javascript instead of jQuery in module.html ?
